bug.author: guidj
bug.description:
In the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/strided_slice>docs</denchmark-link> , the following sentences seem incomplete/incoherent:
If the ith bit of ellipsis_mask [is-set-to-something], as many unspecified dimensions as needed will be inserted between other dimensions. Only one non-zero bit is allowed in ellipsis_mask.
If the ith bit of new_axis_mask is one, then a? begin, end, and stride are ignored and a new length 1 dimension is added at this point in the output tensor

comments.comment: Great, could you make a PR with your change?

I did, and it's already been <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/7831>merged</denchmark-link>
So I guess this can be closed
